thread.section_title: Soho Grand Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice boutique hotel in a great location
thread.title_full: Nice boutique hotel in a great location - Review of Soho Grand Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Rachael P
title: Nice boutique hotel in a great location
text:
Staff incredibly courteous and welcoming, very friendly. Great location for walking around, restaurants, etc. Hotel not "Grand" but nice boutique hotel, room small but comfortable. Think nod to Pre-war or vintage chic. Lounge with comfy sofas are great for a drink, or try the whiskey bar.
Room Tip: Stay on a high floor. Building has good bones, none of this flimsy construction where you hear your... See more room tips
